TEXT.S:
Macedoniau Macedonia (, Ma-Ce-Dun) sa i labu nu Europe (O-Cuo ), itiza i 41 50 N, 22 00 E. u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa 25,713 km2. u ahebal nu lala'ay sa 25,433 km2, u ahebal nu nanumay sa 280 km2. hamin nu tademaw sa 2,100,025. kakalukan umah sa 44.30%, kilakilangan umah sa 39.80%, zumaay henay umah sa 15.90%.
tapang tusu nu kanatalu tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Skopje.
kakingingan nu kanatal demiadkakinging nu kanatal demiad sa 8 bulad 9 demiad.
tabakiay a tapang nu kanatalu tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (cong-tung, ) ayza sa ci Stevo Pendarovski, micakat a demiad sa i 2019 a mihcaan 5 bulad 12 demiad.
ayda nu laylay6 nikudan ni kilisetu enem (6) a secitu lawpes Sela-fu a binacadanmalingatu malimad tayda i Maci-tun (Macedoniamueneng, misumad tu sasinggiaan nuheni tu tunceciw. 910 nikudan nikilisetu siwa (9) a seci Maci-tun (Macedonia Slavic wan-kuomapatideng, tinii i cacay a bataan (10) a se-ci caaysa tu lekal. 111392 Maci-tun (Macedoniamadebung nu hekalay a binacadan sawni paliyuntu i hekalay a tademaw mami kuwan, namaka sabaw tu cacay a (11) a seci sa, Maci-tun (Macedoniaa tademaw kinapina palekal tu sakaada, malawpetu numi kuwanay, namaka cacay a malebut tulu a lasubu siwa a bataan idaw ku tusa (1392) a mihcaan Macedoniamala madebung nu E'tuman Tuelci-tikuomumikuwanay makaala tu lima a secian kunipikuwan. 1913"" cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu cacay a bataan idaw ku tulu (1913) a mihcaan sakatusa anikalpacawan tu Balkans, mahedek satu malepacaw idaw kunikasasulit tu Pucia-lesete' a kiyakuan, u Pawcia-liya (Bulgaria, Si-la (Greeceatu Sayel-wiya (Serbiatatuluay a kanatal makakilac tu Maci-tun (Macedonia. 1919 cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu cacay a bataan idaw ku siwa (1919) a mihcaan sakacacay nu kitakitay a nikalepacawannikudan palu tatengan misuayaw tu Paw, Si, Saynu tuluay a kanatal mikilac tu Maci-tun. 19448"" cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu sepat a bataan idaw ku sepat (1944) a mihcaan waluay a bulad patideng nu "Nande-lahu ming-culan-pan", Maci-tun (Macedoniapayniyadu' a mikeliday panutek mala Nanse-lahu lan-pan. 19454 cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu sepat a bataan idaw ku lima (1945) a mihcaan sepat a bulad Nanlan Cong-tungci "Dituo" pacakaten nuheni ku Maci-tun (Macedoniamala Nanse-lahu lan-panenemay a micumud nu kunghe-kuo, tanektektu kunipisiteked nu Maci-tun. 1991981117 cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu siwa a bataan idaw ku cacay (1991) a mihcaan Nanlanmaliwasak, Maci-tun kunhe-kuonama hekal nikasasuadaan, kapahsa i siwa a bulad walu a demiad mihapu misitekae kamisa, tawya a mihcaan sabaw tu cacay a bulad sabaw tu pitu a demiad Maci-tun kunhe-kuopatideng tu baluhay a sian-fa. 199348Former Yugoslavia Republic of Macedonia (FYROM) cacay a malebud siwa a lasubu siwa a bataan idaw ku tulu (1993 ) a mihcaan sepat a bulad walu a demiad inuayawan a Nanse-lahu Ma-citun kunghe-kuo"Former Yugoslavia Republic of Macedonia", (FYROM) a ngangan ku sapicumud tu lanhekuo. 2019212"" tusa a malebut cacay a bataan idaw ku siwa (2019) a mihcaan tusa a bulad sabaw tu tusa a demiad makaykictu atu Si-laa nganganan nikacenlawan tatenga masumad ku ngangan u " peimaci-tun-kunhe-kuo"[1]
cence nu ayda"")19911120 peimaci-tunnuayawan " Maci-tun" sinfa itida i cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu siwa a bataan idaw ku cacay (1991) a mihcaan asiwantan. 5 Cung-tungu tadenga'ay nu kanatal a sakakaay nu hitay amikeliday, lima a mihcaan kunikala Cung-tung, u binawlan a tademaw ku misingkuwaya patideng, Cung-tung anisingkiwan a kina tusaan a misingkuw kiya matatungus.
cen-ti u ihun mincuce. i labu u Cun-liatu katuuday a sakakaay nikapulungan, mikuwan tu kakawawen.
Cun-li kumi kuwanay tu kawaw, u satalakaway nu tapang, u kuohu a katuuday nu tan ku tahekalay, aw Cung-tun ku panganganay kiya midui ku kuohu. : kasa'timan a kawaw han: pasayda i kuohupatahekal tu sasakamuen, patahekal tu hulic, palutadenga tu nutaw a sihu, atu nutaw anikalecabayan, patahekal panganga tu sakay hekal a sakakaay. ""1991 Maci-tun kunhe-kuoatu biyaw nu kanatal Si-la (Greecemasasualaw tu pinganganan (Si-lailabu nu kanatal idaw ku Maci-tun sen (Macedonianiyadu', Si-la (Greecea tademaw saan tu Maci-tuna ngangan micayatay tu Si-la (Greecea kawaw), nina tusaay a kanatal caay kasasu bahel ku belbel, nina tusaay a kanatal namaka cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu siwa a bataan idaw ku cacay (1991) a mihcaan Maci-tun (Macedoniamisiteked satu mabiyalaw tu. 272018612(Prespa Agreement). mangalay misakapah tu nikacinglawan, nina tusaay a kanatal namaka tusa a bataan idaw ku pitu a mihcaan sa, i tusa a malebut cacay a bataan idaw ku walu (2018) a mihcaan enem a bulad sabaw tu tusa a demiad masasulit tu Lasepa'a sasulitan (Prespa Agreement)a kiyakuan. 2019212"" nikasasulitan katukuh i tusa a malebut cacay a bataan idaw ku siwa (2019) a mihcaan, u Si-la (Greecepatikuen nuheni i O-mum (European Unionatu Peieyimisuaay tu Ma-cutun (Macedonianipicumudan tu funciecun, Maci-tun kunhe-kuoi nuydaan a mihcaan nu tusa a bulad sabaw tu tusa a demiad tatengan misumad tu ngangan u peimaci-tun kunhe-kuo.[2]
